professionalSummary.title: Full-stack Web and Astrology Enthusiast
expertise: Web development using JavaScript, Node.js, React, and Next.js
Building scalable, secure, and reliable web applications
Adhering to industry standards and best practices
Hands-on experience with Firebase and AWS for backend services
User interface design and optimization using Figma
achievements: Created multiple open-source projects with high community engagement.
Successfully built and deployed scalable web applications on Vercel and GitHub Pages.
Actively contributed to developer communities, offering mentorship and code reviews.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A website showcasing skills, projects, and contact details for collaboration.
highlights: Responsive design optimized for both desktop and mobile platforms.
Integrated a real-time feedback form for users to connect.
SEO-optimized content to rank higher in search engines.

projects.name: Web Scraping Tool
projects.description: Python tool for extracting data from websites, automating tasks, and organizing information.
highlights: Supports multithreading for faster data extraction.
Exports data in multiple formats, including CSV and JSON.
Handles CAPTCHA and anti-scraping mechanisms.

projects.name: 101 HTML Features
projects.description: Projects teaching the fundamentals of web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
highlights: Contains interactive tutorials and quizzes for learners.
Covers advanced HTML5 and CSS3 features.
Gamified learning approach to keep users engaged.

projects.name: E-commerce Store
projects.description: A user-friendly store featuring product browsing, cart management, and optional payment integration.
highlights: Integrated with Firebase for user authentication.
Dynamic product listing and inventory management.
Secure payment gateway using Razorpay.

projects.name: Color Paradox
projects.description: Real-time color palette generator with React and Vite.
highlights: Live preview of color palettes with Hex and RGB values.
Allows users to save and share palettes.
Includes accessibility checks for color contrast.

projects.name: OpenAI API Project
projects.description: AI chatbot using OpenAI GPT-3.5 API, runnable in the terminal.
highlights: Implements a conversational interface with memory.
Customizable prompt settings for specific tasks.
Supports multi-language inputs and outputs.

projects.name: ArtVision Gallery
projects.description: Pinterest-like project with front-end focus using array methods.
highlights: Dynamic grid layout with responsive design.
Features like pinning and categorizing items.
Optimized image loading for better performance.

projects.name: GitHub Theme Toggler Website
projects.description: Website with Dark, Light, and Solarized themes persisting via localStorage.
highlights: Theme selection with smooth transitions.
LocalStorage integration to remember user preferences.
Customizable theme palettes.

projects.name: Noi World
projects.description: Dynamic React website showcasing the Nio ES6 luxury electric SUV.
highlights: Features like interactive car models and specs comparison.
Built with React Router for seamless navigation.
Integrated animations for an engaging user experience.

journey.title: Journey to Code
journey.details: Started coding at 14 with a dream to become CEO of a $100 million company by 30.

timeline.milestone: Completed multiple open-source projects and gained proficiency in JavaScript and React.

challenges: Debugging complex code and understanding APIs.
Balancing schoolwork with coding and self-learning.

additionalResources.websiteStatus: Under construction but filled with ongoing progress and projects.

inspirationalQuotes: Coding isn't about being a genius. It's about being persistent and creative.
Every bug is a lesson waiting to be learned.
Think big, start small, and keep iterating.

shortTerm: Publish a technical blog post on Medium.
Complete a certification in cloud computing.
longTerm: Become CEO of a $100 million company by age 30.
Expand open-source contributions to mentor new developers.

activities: Building web applications and experimenting with new technologies.
Contributing to open-source projects and engaging with the developer community.
Solving algorithmic challenges and participating in coding contests.
Studying advanced mathematical concepts like sigma notation and algebra.
Exploring space science and physics through documentaries and online courses.
Learning Spanish to enhance linguistic and cultural knowledge.
Reading motivational books and watching inspirational talks.
Practicing problem-solving techniques for better decision-making.
Exploring astrology as a tool for understanding personality and behavior.

motivationalMantras: If the plan doesn't work, change the plan, but never the goal.
Dream big, start small, but most importantly, start.
Every line of code brings me closer to my goals.
Failures are just stepping stones to success.
The only limit is the one you set for yourself.
